events.title: Community Picnic
events.description: Bring your family and enjoy food, games, and music at the local park.

events.title: Volunteer Day
events.description: Help beautify the community by volunteering your time to clean up the streets.

events.title: Summer Film Series
events.description: Watch classic films under the stars at our weekly outdoor film series.

events.title: Art Walk
events.description: View and purchase artwork from local artists at our annual art walk.

events.title: Community Yard Sale
events.description: Sell your unwanted items or browse for treasures at our community yard sale.

events.title: Community Concert
events.description: Listen to live music from local bands and enjoy food and drinks at our annual community concert.

events.title: Neighborhood Block Party
events.description: Meet your neighbors and enjoy games, food, and activities at our annual neighborhood block party.

events.title: Community Clean-Up Day
events.description: Help keep our community beautiful by volunteering to clean up local parks and streets.

events.title: Farmers Market
events.description: Shop for fresh produce, baked goods, and handmade crafts at our weekly farmers market.

events.title: Halloween Parade
events.description: Dress up in your spookiest costume and join us for a parade through the community followed by trick-or-treating.
